description: '''1476''' is an atmospheric [[art rock]] duo based out of [[Salem, Massachusetts]]. Founded in 2007 by '''Robb Kavjian''' and '''Neil DeRosa''', together they began writing songs which include various themes of Western esoterica, pre-Christian mythology/mysticism, chaos magic, nature, and philosophical themes. They had decided from the beginning to avoid confining themselves to a specific genre and when pressed by interviewers to define their style, they responded with the term, "Hermetic Death Rock."
